Html:
In the Samples\v0.2\ToolTipSample, if I change the x-axis in the xaml to log10 as below:

 <d:ChartPlotter Name="plotter" Grid.Row="1">  

<d:ChartPlotter.DataTransform>

<d:Log10XTransform/>

</d:ChartPlotter.DataTransform>

</d:ChartPlotter>

Then the chart crashes with following exception:

System.ArgumentException was unhandled
  Message="'-Infinity' is not a valid value for property 'Left'."
  Source="WindowsBase"
